title: 1.5 Master Challenge 1
question: Ms. Nora receives an email stating that she has won a prize of one million dollars. She can claim it by clicking the given link. Analyze the situation and find the type of cyber threat Ms. Nora is facing. What should she do to avoid damage or loss?
